Title: Wendy and Lucy
Overview: A near-penniless drifter's journey to Alaska in search of work is interrupted when she loses her dog while attempting to shoplift food for it.
Tagline: On the long road, friendship is everything.
production_companies: Glass Eye Pix, Film Science, Oscilloscope Laboratories, Washington Square Films, Field Guide Films
Cast: Michelle Williams, Will Patton, Will Oldham
clean_text: wendy lucy nearpenniless drifter journey alaska search work interrupt lose dog attempt shoplift food long road friendship drama kelly reichardt michelle williams patton oldham 2008
